loc2.description: Avalanche! Pass a Speed (-1) check or lose 3 Stamina.
loc2.name: the dreamlands

loc1.description: While you are climbing a high cliff, you begin to slip. Pass a Speed (-1) check or crash down the mountain, losing 2 Stamina.
loc1.name: plateau of leng

other.description: The shadowy entity gives up the chase. Lose 1 Stamina from exhaustion.
